results.title: Fatal fetal outcome with the combined use of valsartan and atenolol.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To report a case of anhydramnios, @DISEASE_Lung_agenesis @DISEASE_MESH:C562992 @@@pulmonary hypoplasia@@@, very small placenta, and @DISEASE_Fetal_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D005313 @@@fetal death@@@ in a pregnancy complicated by chronic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ that had been treated through the first 24 weeks of gestation with @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@. CASE SUMMARY: A 40-year-old Hispanic @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with well-controlled chronic @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@ and diet-controlled @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ was treated with @CHEMICAL_Valsartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068756 @@@valsartan@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ until pregnancy was diagnosed at 24 weeks' gestation.

citations.NLM: Briggs GG, Nageotte MP. Fatal fetal outcome with the combined use of valsartan and atenolol. Ann Pharmacother. 2001 Jul-Aug;35(7-8):859-61. PMID: 11485133

results.title: Lisinopril improves endothelial dysfunction in hypertensive NIDDM subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
results.text_hl: We performed a 12-month prospective, randomized, double-blind, parallel study in 43 @<m>DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@hypertensive NIDDM@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic nephropathy@@@ (21 treated with @CHEMICAL_Lisinopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and 22 with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@).
